application.name: FAIR-based Refugee Protection Data Systems
application.description: FAIR-based Refugee Protection Data Systems (RPDS) is a tool for the safe and secure collection of data related to vulnerable refugee populations.

datasets.description: Development for Peace Organization (DPO) is a humanitarian organisation supporting the protection of refugees in Ethiopia. DPO is an Ethiopian National Organization, established in Addis Ababa 2020 and the organization is officially registered in accordance with legislation on Agency for Civil Society Organization by the registration number of 5164.

application.name: Secure FAIR Refugee Protection Information System

datasets.description: Development for Peace Organization (DPO) is a humanitarian organisation supporting the protection of refugees in Ethiopia. DPO is an Ethiopian National Organization, established in Addis Ababa 2020 and the organization is officially registered in accordance with legislation on Agency for Civil Society Organization by the registration number of 5164.

application.name: SafeLine
application.description: SafeLine is an application to safely and securely collect data related to sexual violence in war and conflict-related situations, and in vulnerable populations.

datasets.organization_name: Sudanese Organization for Research and Development (SORD)
datasets.description: Sudanese Organization for Research and Development (SORD), based in Kampala, serves vulnerable populations with a focus on sexual violence in the Horn and East Africa.
Kamukunji Community Empowerment Initiative (KCEI) focuses on support and registration of violence against inhabitants, with a particular focus on registering sexual violence against women and girls.

application.name: Emergency Diary: My Secure Data Place
application.description: The Emergency Diary (ED) provides a secure data place for sensitive personal information by refugees on the move. The data is stored in Solid pods.

datasets.description: The Sanctuary Foundation is a duly registered organisation in Kenya. Our principal objective is to assist new arrivals, including asylum and refugee seekers, in navigating the legal and bureaucratic processes required to obtain asylum status and refugee registration. In this capacity, we collaborate with existing refugee legal aid providers and other organisations that support refugees.

applications.name: SafeVoice: Human Trafficking Source Information
applications.description: This tool assists sources with sensitive information on human trafficking to safely store their information. Catalog of Human Trafficking Source Information for Safevoice, including datasets, metadata records, code, protocols, and persistent identifiers. Metadata follows FAIR principles (Findable, Accessible, Interoperable, Reusable): standardized schemas, machine-readable formats (RDF), access conditions, licensing, and provenance. Covers topics: human trafficking, Kenya, source information, security, safety; institutions: affiliation Sanctuary Foundation.

applications.name: Thinx
applications.description: Catalog of research data for researchers on human trafficking including datasets, metadata records, code, protocols, and persistent identifiers. Metadata follows FAIR principles (Findable, Accessible, Interoperable, Reusable): standardized schemas, machine-readable formats (RDF), access conditions, licensing, and provenance. Covers topics: human trafficking, human trafficking for ransom, refugee protection, migration, routes, torture, human rights violations, Libya, Horn of Africa, Sudan, Tigray, Ethiopia, post-war, conflict, institutions: affiliation Aksum University, Leiden University, Tilburg University.

application.name: Afya.ke EMR Patient Data Hospital Ownership and Analytics Architecture
application.description: COMPASS is a tool to safely store patient data in health clinics.

datasets.description: Mutuini Hospital is a hospital located in Nairobi, Kenya.
